Allow the users to create a new user whe.other: Allow the users to create a new user when sharing a folder

Allow the users to pick an existing user.other: Allow the users to pick an existing user when sharing a folder

Allow to search users from other groups.other: Allow to search users from other groups through auto completer (can be handy if previous option is set to false) and share workspaces with them

Always override other roles, included gr.other: Always override other roles, included group roles.

Do not display real login in parenthesis.other: Do not display real login in parenthesis

Do not load groups and users list if no.other: Do not load groups and users list if no regexp is entered. Avoid sending large search on LDAP.

If previous option is set to True, direc.other: If previous option is set to True, directly display a full list of users from all groups

If set, this action will be triggered au.other: If set, this action will be triggered automatically at users login. Can be logout (to lock out the users), pass_change (to force password change), or anything else

If the 'guest' user is enabled, remember.other: If the 'guest' user is enabled, remember her preferences accross sessions.

Image displayed next to the user name.other: Изображение, которое отображается рядом с именем пользователя

Let user create repositories from templa.other: Let user create repositories from templates

List of parameters to be edited when cre.other: List of parameters to be edited when creating a new shared user.

Maximum number of shared users per user.other: Максимальное количество общих пользователей для этого пользователя

Maximum number of users displayed in the.other: Maximum number of users displayed in the users autocompleter

Minimum number of characters to trigger.other: Minimum number of characters to trigger the auto completion feature

Sets how the application core data (user.other: Sets how the application core data (users,roles,etc) is stored.

Share with existing users from all group.other: Share with existing users from all groups

Simple SQL Connexion definition that can.other: Simple SQL Connexion definition that can be used by other sql-based plugins

Some roles should be disappered in the l.other: Some roles should be disappered in the list.  list separated by ',' or start with 'preg:' for regex.

Some roles should be shown in the list..other: Some roles should be shown in the list.  list separated by ',' or start with 'preg:' for regex.

Use this option to avoid automatic reloa.other: Use this option to avoid automatic reloading of the interface state (last folder, opened tabs, etc)

Users only (do not list groups nor roles.other: Users only (do not list groups nor roles)

Whether users can create their own repos.other: Whether users can create their own repositories, based on predefined templates.
